message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product and am interested in purchasing it. I would like to propose a price of $9000.

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $9000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11500. This is my best price, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I understand your position, and I'm willing to consider your counteroffer. I would like to propose a price of $10500.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a bit more profit. I'm counteroffering at $12000. This is my best price, and I think it's a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your efforts in finding a middle ground. I would like to propose a price of $11000.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'm counteroffering at $12500. This is my final price, and I think it's a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $11500.

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm not sure I can go any lower than my previous offer. I'm counteroffering at $12500 again, but I'm willing to throw in a small bonus or warranty to sweeten the deal. This is my final offer, and I'm not budging.
I appreciate your efforts, but I believe $12500 is still a bit high for me. I would like to propose a price of $12000.
